topic.title: 새로운 애완동물 입양 상담하기
topic.description: 동물 보호소에서 새로운 애완동물을 입양하기 위해 직원과 상담하는 상황입니다.

korean_scripts.korean_text: 저는 아파트에서 키울 수 있는 작은 강아지를 원해요.
이 아이는 성격이 매우 온순하고 사람을 잘 따라요.
먼저 입양 신청서를 작성해 주셔야 해요.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: Hello, I'm here because I'd like to adopt a dog.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: Hello, | I'm here because | I'd like to adopt a dog.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: What kind of dog are you looking for?
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: What kind of dog | are you looking for?

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: I want a small dog that I can raise in an apartment.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: I want a small dog | that I can raise | in an apartment.

foreign_scripts.foreign_text: This one has a very gentle personality and gets along well with people.
foreign_scripts.chunked_text: This one has a very gentle personality | and gets along well | with people.
